page.title: 19Eversley By-pass
page.content: We met{Councillor Philip Todd}who told us about things which concern Eversley people. He told us about the need for a{by-pass}because of houses being shaken by heavy lorries thundering down The Street. The by-pass has not been built yet as there is not enough money available. There is also a public enquiry going on at the moment about the amount of{gravel extraction}from Eversley Common. Another concern is about{street {lights}in Kingsley Road, but only about a third of the residents wantthem. Eversley is also worried about what will happen to the area now that British Car Auctions have bought {Blackbushe Airport,}particularly because of the possible increase of traffic through the village.
